duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct on-the-line checks of product against recipe specifications and quality standards
Perform visual inspection during labeling process to ensure proper placement of labels and correct product/ingredient names
Issue correct QC samples to production team leads and associates prior to production, ensuring the correct portion amount for specific ingredients
Utilize production sheets to verify proper meal bag line setup and conduct hourly visual inspections to ensure meal bag accuracy
Verify the setup of the shipping line and conduct hourly visual inspections to ensure accuracy
Completes and properly documents QC inspections of all inbound/outbound ingredients and escalate issues to FSQA Supervisor/FSQA leadership if necessary
Assist in post-operation clean up, equipment setup and maintenance, and issue escalation as needed

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required
Previous experience working in food quality preferred
